title: get_cudnn_version in collect_env is flaky
body_html:
🐛 Bug

get_cudnn_version currently only looks for libcudnn in /usr/local and /usr/bin, which sometimes fails to get the version of cudnn we have.

We should look as well in other places, maybe in LD_LIBRARY_PATH or CUDNN_LIB_DIR as well, which might give more indications of where it might be.

body:
## 🐛 Bug

`get_cudnn_version` [currently only looks for `libcudnn` in `/usr/local` and `/usr/bin`](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/utils/collect_env.py#L111), which sometimes fails to get the version of cudnn we have.

We should look as well in other places, maybe in `LD_LIBRARY_PATH` or `CUDNN_LIB_DIR` as well, which might give more indications of where it might be.
